Question
========

Which of the following assumptions does **not** belong in inferential regression?

Answerlist
----------

* The population mean approximately follows a straight line.
* The population values of y are normally distributed for any value of x.
* The sample mean of x is chi-square distributed.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The population mean roughly follows a straight line...: Incorrect
* The population values of y are normally distributed for any value of x.: Incorrect
* The sample mean of x is chi-square distributed...: Correct
